data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the county of Siddharth Nagar.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Siddharth Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Siddharth Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Siddharth Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Siddharth Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Rajput Bhale Sultan (Muslim traditions) people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, teach the children in the county of Siddharth Nagar to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Father, it’s possible most of the 2,500,095 lost people in  Siddharth Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.section_summary:
the county of Siddharth Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 2,559,300.

We estimate Siddharth Nagar has 28,152 people who might know Jesus, 31,053 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,500,095 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Siddharth Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.
